thread.title: Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener
thread.title_full: Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener

author: GREG BEACHAM
title: Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener
text:
Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
San Jose Sharks' Logan Couture, left, is checked by Los Angeles Kings' Dustin Brown during the first period of an NHL hockey game Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
Los Angeles Kings' Kyle Clifford, left, fights with San Jose Sharks' Mike Brown during the first period of an NHL hockey game Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
San Jose Sharks' Joe Pavelski, left, celebrates his goal with Joe Thornton as Los Angeles Kings' Dustin Brown, right, skates past them during the first period of an NHL hockey game Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
Los Angeles Kings goalie Jonathan Quick sprays water on his face before an NHL hockey game against the San Jose Sharks, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
San Jose Sharks goalie Martin Jones, center, falls to the ice as he stops a shot by Los Angeles Kings' Tyler Toffoli, right, during the second period of an NHL hockey game, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Jae C. Hong Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener 
San Jose Sharks goalie Martin Jones makes a save during the second period of an NHL hockey game against the Los Angeles Kings, Wednesday, Oct. 7, 2015, in Los Angeles. (AP Photo/Jae C. Hong) Posted: Wednesday, October 7, 2015 10:38 pm Pavelski leads Sharks' 5-1 rout of LA Kings in season opener Associated Press | 
LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” Captain Joe Pavelski had a goal and two assists, and Joonas Donskoi scored in his NHL debut in the San Jose Sharks' 5-1 victory over the Los Angeles Kings on Wednesday night in both clubs' season opener. 
Joe Thornton and Brent Burns had a goal and an assist apiece, and Tomas Hertl also scored as the Sharks thoroughly dominated their California rivals in coach Peter DeBoer's successful debut. Subscription Required An online service is needed to view this article in its entirety. You
